content:
Also, bitcoin’s fundamental failings and the human family tree grows bigger

OMAR AL-BASHIR, the president of Sudan since 1989, has stepped down after months of protests against his rule. What happens next? Also, Bitcoin has turned ten, but its promise to upend the financial system is still a far way off. And the discovery of a new species of human complicates the picture of our evolution. Runtime: 23 min.

Listen on: Apple Podcasts  |  Spotify  |  Google  |  Stitcher  |  TuneIn

ex: n. 执行时间，运行时间

wp.Reports Runtime: 不指定报表名而打开;报表运行器

ex: n. 〔机〕缝针；拼逢机；钉箱机；齿形压滚
网络 带材缝合机；钉书机；订书机
n. 苏丹；【国】苏丹；苏丹共和国
网络 喀土穆；尔丹；部长阁下

wp.complicate e: 结构复杂的;使某事复杂化;使复杂;使陷入

ex: vt. 使复杂化；使恶化；使卷入
eg2: If the answer to all of these questions is no, a framework will only complicate matters.
如果所有这些问题的答案都为否，那么使用框架只会把事情变复杂。
The selection service is one of the more difficult services to implement correctly because it has some valuable features that  the implementation.
选择服务是比较难以正确实现的服务之一，因为它具有一些使实现复杂化的有价值的功能。
The differences in command line tools, output formats, values, and other information all  what should otherwise be a simple process.
命令行工具、输出格式、值和其他信息之间的差异全都会使原本应该简单的过程变得复杂化。

ex: 网络 免职；宣誓作证；废除
eg2: The president was deposed in a military coup.
总统在军事政变中被废黜。

ex: n. 暴君；专制统治者；专制君主
网络 豪强；专制者；独裁者
eg2: an enlightened despot(= one who tries to use his/her power in a good way)
开明的专制君主

ex: n. 发现，发觉；被发现的事物

wp.Discovery Turbo: Discovery动力频道;探索动力频道

wp.Discovery Sport: 发现运动版;发现神行;路虎发现神行;路虎发现运动版
wp.discovery service: 探索服务;发现服务;没啥大用的;业务诊断和分析
wp.Discovery News: 探索新闻;发现新闻;探索新闻网;新闻网站
wp.discovery sampling: 发现抽样法;		发现抽样;探索抽样;新出现样品
wp.device discovery: 设备发现;设备搜寻;设备搜索;装置搜寻
wp.discovery procedure: 发现程序;发现程序发现程序;种发现过程;证据开示程序

eg2: She credited herself with the .
她把那项发现归功于她自己。
The policeman rang in to report his new .
这位警察给本部打电话报告他的新发现。
The  of America is generally referred to Columbus.
一般人都说美洲是哥伦布发现的。

ex: n. 演变；进化；发展；渐进
网络 演化；进化论；演进
eg2: the evolution of the human species
人类的进化
Darwin's theory of evolution
达尔文的进化论
In politics Britain has preferred evolution to revolution(= gradual development to sudden violent change) .
英国在政治上宁愿渐进而不愿革命。

wp.fundamental component: 基波分量;基频分量;		基本分量;基本成份
wp.fundamental physics: 基础物理;		基础物理学;基础物理学院;普通物理
wp.fundamental color: 基色;知颜色;基本色;原色
wp.fundamental frequency: 基本频率;		基频;基频率;		基波频率
wp.fundamental polygon: 基本多边形;基本多角形
wp.Fundamental Mathematics: 基础数学;根蒂根基算术;数学基础;基础数学I

ex: n. 基本原理；基本原则
eg2: We should direct our attention at the fundamental question.
我们应把注意力集中在这个基本问题。
This decision represents the fundamental interests of the people.
这个决定反映了广大人民的根本利益。
Independence and sovereign equality among states is a fundamental principle of international law.
国家的独立和主权平等， 是国际法上的一项根本原则。
To what extent it is capable of leveraging these powers to upend Western hegemony of technology is a truly fascinating question.
中国会在什么程度上利用这些力量来推翻西方的技术霸权，这确实是一个引人遐思的问题。
So what happened in 1940, decades before the large-scale influx of women into the workplace, to  the multigenerational tradition?
那么，在妇女大规模地开始工作的十年前——1940年，到底发生了什么来颠覆“多代”的传统？
For 40 years, Karten and colleagues have worked to  this thinking.
40年来，卡特和他的同事都在试图推翻这种认识。

Title: Sudan’s despot is deposed, and more from our daily podcast
